title: Deployment to Heroku fails
body:
### System information
- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: Heroku
- **Python version**: 3.6.8

### Describe the problem
I tried deploying to Heroku using the button in README and it failed.
